question: The online monitoring portal named ‘GATI’ was recently launched by which Union Ministry?
option1: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
option2: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
option3: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
answer: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
explanation:
The Union ministry of road transport and highways has recently launched an online monitoring portal named ‘GATI’. The new portal is created by the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) is on the lines of the PRAGATI portal used by the Prime Minister Office for monitoring the government proposals and projects.
The GATI portal can be accessed from the NHAI website and contractors, in which the project related issues can be raised. The portal will be continuously monitored by a team of NHAI officers and the issues raised will be immediately taken up.
